title: Jamie Anderson on snowboarding, managing nerves, and the power within
description:
Jamie Anderson is a snowboarder from the USA who is a double Olympic champion. She has won the coveted slopestyle title twice. Heading into the season, nearly four years on, she remains one of the top performers . In 2020, she became the female with the most medals in the history of the X Games. Away from snowboarding, Jamie is into yoga and meditation as ways to switch off. Ash Tulloch joined Jamie for a chilled-out chat.

Anna Gasser episode
